step1.title: Verify Information
step1.content: To create your account, we need some basic information.

step2.title: Terms & Conditions
step2.content: To access at the app, you need to accept our Terms & Conditions.

step3.title: Project Recommendations
step3.content: Help us recommend projects that match your interests.

step4.title: Complete Your Profile
step4.content: To help you connect with other members and showcase your expertise.

step5.title: Payout Information
step5.content: To claim rewards, you will need to verify your identity or business.

public.subtitle: Sign-up and create your account
public.description: Get access to more than 200 projects to contribute to.

learnMore.title: Learn more about Onlydust
learnMore.subtitle: “I don’t know where to start.” Sound familiar? Read on.
learnMore.description: When asking contributors what the most challenging thing for them was when starting out on their open source journey, we started to notice some common frustrations that many have faced at some point or another.
